job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pAs a Data Scientist you will apply your skills to increase digital adoption engagement and behavior change leveraging CVS Healths digital productsppbrppAetnas Member Analytics team is an innovative team tasked with optimizing our ability to engage with members to help them make better healthcare decisionsppbrppOur goal is to improve clinical outcomes and to help members gain more transparency into the healthcare system so that they can save money To do this weve developed a leading capability that combines data science agile marketing behavioral economics large scale experimentation and optimization of our digital properties and applications Through this we message millions of members each year about real challenges they face and help them become healthier and save money  we drive tangible and meaningful impact for our membersppbrppstrongAs a Data Scientist you willstrongpulliDevelop validate and execute algorithms and predictive models to investigate problems detect patterns and recommend solutionsliliPerform analyses of structured and unstructured data to solve moderately complex business problems utilizing advanced statistical techniques and mathematical analysesliliCreate data structures and pipelines to organize collect and standardize data that helps generate insights and addresses reporting needsliliUse data visualization techniques to effectively communicate analytical results and support business decisionsliliEvaluate the data needs of assigned projects and assure the integrity of the dataliliDocument projects business objectives data gathering and processing detailed set of results and analytical metricsliulpbrppstrongRequired Qualificationsstrongpulli2 years of relevant Machine Learning model building experienceliliExperience with Python R and SQLliulpbrppstrongPreferred QualificationsstrongpulliHealthcare industry experienceliliExperience with Experimental Design and or AB testingliliStrong written and verbal communication skillsliliProblem resolution skillsliliProficiency in several areas of data modeling machine learning algorithms statistical analysis and data engineeringliliAbility to work with large data sets from multiple sourcesliulpbrppstrongEducationstrongpulliBachelors degree or equivalent work experience in Mathematics Statistics and Computer ScienceliliMasters degree preferredliulpbrppstrongBusiness OverviewstrongppAt CVS Health we are joined in a common purpose helping people on their path to better health We are working to transform health care through innovations that make quality care more accessible easier to use less expensive and patientfocused Working together and organizing around the individual we are pioneering a new approach to total health that puts people at the heartp
